name: Firefox Microsoft Edge Style
description:
Light (#f2f2f2) style inspired by Microsoft Edge.
Requires Aero Glass (Windows 8 extension works too), Hide Titlebar Plus (https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/13505/) with specific settings and Simple White (http://www.louis.hk/whitefox/) to work correctly.
Tested on Windows 8.1 (worked flawlessly)
Mac OS X (white bar instead of semi transparent Aero + little tweaking in
#main-window:not([chromehidden*="toolbar"])[sizemode="normal"] section)
and Arch GNU/Linux (same as OS X).
Works the best with light wallpapers
